snippet: FLEITMAN--Alexander. We note with sorrow the passing of our Longtime member, Alexander Foster Fleitman and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Angela W. Buchdahl and President Abby Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
lead_paragraph: FLEITMAN--Alexander. We note with sorrow the passing of our Longtime member, Alexander Foster Fleitman and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Angela W. Buchdahl and President Abby Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
